method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _v5
method.comment: Returns a string of spaces. The number returned is set by HowMany.

method.name: _v6
method.comment: Displays a MessageBox with all Characters and their ASCII codes.

method.name: _v7
method.comment: Returns the position of the SearchFor within YourString.

method.name: _v0
method.comment: Returns the number of the current week, 1-52 from the date passed to MyDate.

method.name: _vv1
method.comment: Returns the day of the month like 1-31, from the date passed to MyDate.

method.name: _vv3
method.comment: Converts an encrypted string of text to readable format, no key is needed.

method.name: _vv5
method.comment: Test to see if the string is empty and returns True if it is, otherwise returns False.

method.name: _vv6
method.comment: Converts a string of text to simple encryption, no Key is needed.

method.name: _vv7
method.comment: This will erase all data saved with the SaveData function stored in the temporary vault.

method.name: _vv0
method.comment:
Returns True if the filename passed does exist, otherwise returns False. Be sure to include the path like:
If FileExist("/mnt/sdcard/mydata.dat") Then MsgBox("Yes", "The Answer")

method.name: _vvv1
method.comment:
Gets data from the temporary vault.
EditText1.Text = SF.GetData("EnteredName")
The Key is case sensitive.

method.name: _getvvvvvvvv3
method.comment: Returns external/physical SD Card directory. This function may not return the correct store on an Android OS above 4.1. This is due to changes made to the OS system in the newer versions. Returns "", if the store can not be read.

method.name: _vvv3
method.comment:
This is a single line if conditional test. If Value1 is true, Value2 is returned, otherwise Value3 will be returned. Works with strings and booleans. Example:
MsgBox(iif("Bob"="Jim", "They are the same", "They are not the same"), "The Answer") or MyBoolean = iif(FirstTime = True, StartMyService = True, StartMyService = False)

method.name: _initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object for use.

method.name: _vvv4
method.comment: Returns the position of the SearchFor within YourString.

method.name: _vvv5
method.comment: Test to see if the string is empty and returns True if it is, otherwise returns False.

method.name: _vvv6
method.comment: Returns the Left portion of a string with the number of characters passed in Length.

method.name: _vvv7
method.comment: Returns the length of the string.

method.name: _vvv0
method.comment: Converts a List object to a String.

method.name: _vvvv1
method.comment: Converts a List object to a String Array.

method.name: _vvvv2
method.comment: Returns the string converted to Lowercase characters.

method.name: _vvvv3
method.comment: Returns a new string with the leading spaces removed.

method.name: _vvvv4
method.comment: Same as MsgBox but only needs one parameter.

method.name: _vvvv5
method.comment:
Returns the a new String for how ever many characters passed in Length from a starting position passed in Start. Example:
Mid("This is a long line of text", 5, 2) In this example the function will Return: "is"

method.name: _vvvv6
method.comment:
Used to extract text from a string between to other blocks of text.
Ans = MidExtract("Dr. Jim Joe Brown", "Jim", "Brown") 'Returns: Joe
Ans = MidExtract("Dr. Jim [Joe] Brown", "[", "]") 'Returns: Joe

method.name: _vvvv7
method.comment: Works like the Mid$ function in Visual Basic.

method.name: _vvvv0
method.comment: Returns the number of the current month 1-12 as Int type, from the date passed to MyDate.

method.name: _vvvvv1
method.comment: Returns the Name the current month as a String like January, etc., from the date passed to MyDate.

method.name: _vvvvv2
method.comment: Returns a new date adding or subtracting HowManyDays. HowManyDays can be positive or negative numbers.

method.name: _vvvvv3
method.comment: Returns the numbers of days passed between the two dates passed.

method.name: _vvvvv4
method.comment:
Used to pad a string with a selected character. If Post = True the padding will follow any text in the string, if Post = False, the padding will be before the text. Length is the total length for the padded string. PadWith is the selected character to use for the padding.
SF.Pad("Jimmy Joe", "*", 20, True) 'Returns "Jimmy Joe***********"

method.name: _vvvvv5
method.comment:
Returns the string in proper format. Example:
MyText = "jim joe brown" MyText = SF.Proper(Mytext) This function will return: "Jim Joe Brown"

method.name: _vvvvv6
method.comment: Repeats any character passed, a selected number of Times.

method.name: _vvvvv7
method.comment: Returns the Right portion of a string with the number of characters passed in Length.

method.name: _vvvvv0
method.comment: Returns a string of ramdom characters with a length specified by StringLength. CharacterType tells the function what type of characters to return. CharacterType = 0 for Upper and Lower case CharacterType = 1 for Upper case only CharacterType = 2 for Lower case only

method.name: _vvvvvv1
method.comment: Returns a new string with the trailing spaces removed.

method.name: _vvvvvv2
method.comment:
Save data passed in a temporary file.
SF.SaveData("ScreenTitle", MyVar) or SF.SaveData("EnteredName", EditText1.Text)

method.name: _vvvvvv3
method.comment:
Returns information about the devices screen. You can pass these parameters: Pass "W" for Width Pass "H" for Height Pass "S" for Scale Pass "D" for DPI
Call like: SF.ScrInfo("W")

method.name: _vvvvvv4
method.comment:
Returns True if the Date1 and the Date2 are within x Days(DateRange) of each other. Pass the dates as Strings. Example:
SearchDate("03/01/2013", "02/15/2013", 30)

method.name: _vvvvvv5
method.comment:
Returns a LIST of items from the string split at the Delimiter. EXAMPLE:
Dim ANS As List ANS = SF.Split("This is a test string.", " ")

method.name: _vvvvvv6
method.comment:
Returns just the one element selected with GetElement from the string. EXAMPLE:
ANS = SF.SplitGetWord("This is a test string.", " ", 2) In this example the function will Return: "is"

method.name: _vvvvvv7
method.comment: Used to sort a String Array. Sort will be in Ascending order if Ascending = True.

method.name: _vvvvvv0
method.comment: Converts a String Array to a List object.

method.name: _vvvvvvv1
method.comment: Convert a String to a List object. This will split the string between words.

method.name: _vvvvvvv2
method.comment:
Used to replace text in a string with new text. Example:
MyText = "I will tell you that joe is a good friend!" MyText = SF.Stuff(MyText, "Joe Brown", "joe") This function will return: "I will tell you that Joe Brown is a good friend!"

method.name: _vvvvvvv3
method.comment: Returns the devices date.

method.name: _vvvvvvv4
method.comment: Returns a new string with leading and trailing spaces removed.

method.name: _vvvvvvv5
method.comment: Returns the string converted to Uppercase characters.

method.name: _vvvvvvv6
method.comment: Returns the numerical value of a string. If the string contains now value it returns 0.

method.name: _vvvvvvv7
method.comment: Returns True if the date passed is a Valid date.

method.name: _vvvvvvv0
method.comment: Returns the number of the day of the week 1-7 as a String, from the date passed to MyDate.

method.name: _vvvvvvvv1
method.comment: Returns the name of the day of the week like Sunday, Monday, etc., from the date passed to MyDate.

method.name: _vvvvvvvv2
method.comment:
Returns the year of the date passed in MyDate. Example:
SF.Year("01/01/2013") returns "2013"

property.name: _vvvvvvvv3
property.comment: Returns external/physical SD Card directory. This function may not return the correct store on an Android OS above 4.1. This is due to changes made to the OS system in the newer versions. Returns "", if the store can not be read.
